title: Team Top Secret. - Looking for an ADC
body:
Hi,

Team name: Top Secret

Looking for an ADC
Rank: Silver +
Age:  18+

Commitment: If i say there is training at such time and date i expect you there unless is an good reason why you cant make it.

If you dont have a good reason it will result as a dismissal.

Maturity level: been able to take feedback contructive of course, and also not to talk smack while in game if its not going your way.

Mic needed. 
We communicate through skype.

We train two times per day starting on wednesday.

Add me if interested

replies.body:
IGN:QwertyQwerty
Ranked: Plat 3
Age: 16 (please)
Ive been in many competitive games, usually fill in solq but in dynamic/competitive mostly an adc role

Would i be able to join. im only bronze 3 but i havent played ranked and feel i could learn quickly and i have a high commitment level
IGN: Exalted Lucina
Rank :Bronze 3
Age: 19
i have a Mic and skype
